person.persName: William F. Marvin (Boyle County, Danville, Kentucky, writer, poet and shoemaker)

body.p: Boyle County, Danville, Kentucky, writer, poet, and shoemaker. Native of England. Married to Charlotte Ash Marvin in Saint Mary, Nottingham, England on August 11, 1825. Served in Second Kentucky Infantry as a private during Mexican-American War. Shoemaker in Danville, Boyle County, Kentucky in 1850. Known for writing poem “The Battle of Monterey” which was published in Danville, Kentucky in 1851. Shoemaker in Danville, Boyle County, Kentucky in 1860.
